tracks.text: Bandai Namco
Bandai Namco Filmworks
Kodansha
6 people stare, stone faced. Sakai taps his chin.
The Boss's eyes widen. Drops of sweat form on his face.
He looks down at a sword stabbing into his chest.
Sakai holds it. The others approach, weapons drawn.
From the chest, Haga sweats.
Cubes float in blue streams of light.
The light eminates from a stone tablet.
Red and black text appears. Quality Assurance in Another World. The text becomes grainy and glitches.
Haga presses his hands against a stone wall.
He pulls out a pad of paper and writes.
Nikola carries boxes near a tent.
She trips, dropping papers. She gets up, dirt smudging her face.
Amano sits at a desk. Character designs hang on a nearby wall.
He presents the papers to Lou, sitting in a bed.
A silver haired elf slices meat. She turns, holding plates of food.
Tesla, glowing, floats in the stream of blue.
Light passes over the Play-Ing Inc group, including Sakai and Sumida. The Boss stands alone.
A black knight with a green cape and broadsword walk through a barren land.
A small man sits in a glowing pod, surrounded by a nest of wires.
The small man transforms into Haga.
Amano puts his hands on the ground and glows green.
Haga races past the glow, knife in hand.
A kitra swipes at him. He leaps back, and the elf leaps over him, coming down with a broadsword.
She slices through the tusked monster's right arm.
A variety of monsters approach. Nikola stands alone, mouth open.
Blue light erupts, knocking back the monsters.
A dragon roars. The elf, Amano, Haga, and Nikola look up at it.
Haga tenses
Montage of character faces, including Lou and Haga's party. Nikola is consumed in flames. Haga reaches out into white light while screaming.
A platform sits in a rectangular pool in a dark stone room. A green diamond sits in a library. A king is flanked by a man and a rabbit woman.
Haga and party look at a village from a cliff. A tablet sits on a desk.
The Boss lies bloody on the ground, with weapons sticking out of his body. Sakai uses his fingers to frame the scene.
Sakai kicks
Haga swallows
Amano sweats and stares hard at the Boss's body.
In the empty banquet room, the hiding chest lifts opemn.
The trio look at each other and nod
Haga kneels in front of the Boss
Haga pushes the stone at Nikola's face.
Tesla chomps
Amano pulls a dagger and stabs the Boss's body repeatedly
Haga looks down
Tesla leaves
The trio walk through the castle
The room shakes
A bald, Play-ing man removes a stone from the castle tower.
The tower rocks
The tower rocks the other way. The stones separate, and the tower collapses.
Kizaki, the bald man, runs
Kizaki leaps as the tower crashes to the ground. The dust and wind blow past the Play-Ing group
The group places their palms together and nod slightly
A stone rattles then flies away. Haga, Amano, and Nikola stand.
Sakai and company stares
Haga grabs the 2. He runs across the courtyard to the entrance.
A brown haired woman glows purple, gaining a bow and arrows.
She fires 10 arrows at once
They land in Haga's back
Haga keeps running
A blond woman raises her hand, an a fiery orb forms, growing 3 times higher than her.
Sakai glows, and vines shoot from his hand, reaching towards the trio. Nikola bats at them, while Amano swings a knife.
Kizaki glows.
Kizaki catches up to Haga and punches him in the face. He goes flying, dropping the 2.
Haga bleeds. Nikola cries.
Haga reaches out a hand. Sakai steps on it.
The group floats in front of him, holding Debug Stones.

Now Loading... Thief. While officially banned, organizations of thieves are an absolute necessity for gathering intelligence on enemy nations. Thus, in this country, they are tacitly allowed to exist. None can escape the eyes of the thieves guild.

Now Loading... Shaman. Those who commune with spirits and the divine. With the use of special catalysts and rituals, they can borrow the power of such beings. Common among races descended from the gods, such as lord elves and dwarves.
Amano walks
Amano looks down
He gets to his knees
A sword goes through his hands
Sakai rests a foot on Amano's back
Amano glows
A gust of wind pushes the group back
They fly through the entrance
They fly out the other side of the entryway tunnel, in front of the gate.
Amano pants
The group is floating, frozen in place.
Sakai, Kanna, Kizaki, and the other 4 float, mouths open as if screaming, and unmoving. Not even their eyes can move.
Haga's hit by the inferno blast
Nikola pokes Sakai's foot
Tesla eats a stone, with 3 behind her. Haga drinks red potions, with empty ones lying around him.
Fantasy
A figure ahead of them
Amano runs at the Boss, who catches and disarms him
The Boss leans in and whispers into Amano's ear. Amano's eyes widen.
The Boss tosses Amano to Haga
The Boss waves as he leaves.
Amano stands back, and turns around.
Amano looks at Lou's necklace in his hands.
To be continued
Credits roll near stylized still drawings. Nikola carries a staff and walks ahead of Haga.
Amano, Haga, and Nikola stand in a mountainous area. Haga and holds a paper and quill. Nikola holds the same and watches Haga. Amano smiles.
Amano sits, holding drafts of manga. Nikola and Haga stand at the far side of the room, near windows.
Haga, Nikola, Amano, and a silver haired elf girl sit around a campfire, eating meat. The sun sets behind the woods surrounding them.
Nikola looks up, mouth open wide. A blue stream of light flickers and rises above her, shooting into the sky, until it explodes in fireworks.
Haga, Nikola, Amano, and the silver haired elf girl stare at the night sky over mountains. Nikola points at the blue firework, sparkling above them.
Nikola floats in the air, glowing purple, and holding a wooden staff.
Haga, Amano, and the silver haired elf stand in a lit, green grove. Nikola runs to them as Amano waves.
